package.name: nuxeo-social-collaboration
package.title: Nuxeo Social Collaboration
package.description:
The Nuxeo Social Collaboration brings social network features to the Nuxeo Platform, such as:
Social workspaces, which provide a project-centric view of content,
A circle-based relationship network, to create meaningful connections across geographic and organizational boundaries,
Activity streams, to quickly see what your network works on,
Micro-messaging, to quickly share information with your network.
